item.title: Leetcode941-Valid Mountain Array
item.description: Given an array A of integers, return true if and only if it is a valid mountain array. Recall that A is a mountain array if and only if: A.length >= 3 There exists some i with 0 < i < A.length - 1 such that: A[0] < A[1] < ... A[i-1] < A[i] A[i] > A[i+1] > ... > A[B.length - 1] 这是一道简单题，题意就是判断一个数组是否存在且只存在一个山顶，其实就是判断是否数组是先升后降的，并且不存在相等元素。
